text: Sergei Fedorovich Bondarchuk (; ; Ukrainian: Сергі́й Фе́дорович Бондарчу́к, Serhiy Fedorovych Bondarchuk; 25 September 192020 October 1994) was a Soviet and Russian actor, movie director, and screenwriter. He is known for his historical dramas such as the 4-part movie version of Leo Tolstoy's War and Peace and the Napoleonic War epic Waterloo.War and Peace of Sergei Bondarchuk ==References== Category:1920 births Category:1994 deaths Category:Soviet movie actors Category:Soviet screenwriters Category:Russian stage actors Category:Russian movie directors
